heroSubtitle: The easiest way to book day-old chicks, growers, and mature chickens in Nigeria. A simple, step-by-step process right from your phone.
whatWeOfferSubtitle: Select from our range of high-quality birds to meet your poultry needs.
noProductsAvailable: No products available at the moment. Please check back later.
howItWorksSubtitle: Secure your chickens in 3 simple steps.
step1Desc: Select your birds, quantity, and pay a small booking fee to get your place in line.
step2Desc: Our manager will call to confirm your allocation, collection date, and the final balance payment.
step3Desc: Visit the collection point on the agreed date, pay the balance, and collect your chickens.
fromChickToMarketSubtitle: Understand the journey of our birds and what to expect at each stage.
dayOldChicksDesc: The first few weeks are crucial. Our day-old chicks are from top-tier hatcheries, giving them a healthy start. They require warmth, special feed, and close monitoring.
growerStageDesc: After the initial delicate phase, they enter the grower stage. At 4 weeks, they are more resilient and experience rapid growth, building the framework for a healthy mature bird.
maturityAndMarketDesc: Our broiler breeds typically reach full maturity for meat production in just 5-6 weeks. At this point, they have achieved their optimal weight and are ready for the market.
bookingStep1Subtitle: Choose the type of chicken you want to book.
noProductsForBookingDesc: The manager has not added any products for booking yet. Please check back later.
bookingStep2Subtitle: How many chickens would you like to book? (Minimum 1)
bookingStep3Subtitle: Please provide your contact information. The manager will call you.
phoneNumberDesc: We need this to call you about your booking.
bookingStep4Subtitle: Review your details. Paying the booking fee secures your place in the queue.
importantHowItWorksDesc: Paying the booking fee secures your spot in the queue for the next available batch. A manager will call you on {phone} to confirm your collection date and the final balance, which is payable on collection.
confirmationSubtitle: Thank you for your booking. Your booking ID is:
confirmationDesc: A manager will call you soon on {phone} to confirm your allocation, collection date, and the final balance to be paid on collection day.
loginSubtitle: Enter your credentials to access your account.
loginForTestingDesc: First, use the Sign Up page to create a demo account with one of the special emails below. You can choose any password.
signupSubtitle: Join AFDEC to start booking your chickens today.
creatingDemoAccountsDesc: To test different roles, sign up with a special email below. Any other email will create a standard customer account, which can then be promoted by a CEO.
agentPortalWelcome: Welcome back, {agentName}. Here's your referral dashboard.
referralLinkDesc: Share this link or your code to earn commissions.
accessDeniedAgent: You do not have permission to view this page. Ensure you are signed in as an agent.
errorLoadingAgentData: Could not load your agent information.
ceoDashboardSubtitle: Oversee all operations, users, and agents.
managerDashboardSubtitle: Manage all bookings and products from here.
manageProductsDesc: Add, edit, and control available birds.
userManagementDesc: Manage roles and permissions for all users.
accessDeniedAdmin: You do not have the necessary permissions to view this page. Please sign in as a Manager or CEO.
errorFetchingBookings: Could not load bookings. There might be a network issue or a problem with the query.
statusUpdatedAndCommissionDesc: Booking completed. Commission of {amount} processed for the agent.
userManagementSubtitle: Assign roles and manage user accounts.
accessDeniedCEO: Only the CEO can access this page.
noOtherUsersFoundDesc: As more users sign up, they will appear here.
userStatusUpdated: The user's account status has been updated.
productCatalogSubtitle: Add, edit, and manage available bird products for booking.
noProductsFoundDesc: Get started by adding your first product or seeding demo data.
seedingProductsDesc: Demo products are being added to your database.
seedingFailedDesc: Could not add demo products. Check console for errors.
addProductDesc: Add a new product to your catalog.
editProductDesc: Edit the details of your catalog.
inactiveProductsDesc: Inactive products won't be visible to customers.
footerSlogan: The easiest way to book day-old chicks, growers, and mature chickens in Nigeria.
importantBusinessNoticeDesc: Paying the booking fee secures your place in the queue for the next available batch of chickens. Our manager will call you to confirm allocation, final balance, and your collection date.
copyright: Â© {year} AFDEC Online. All Rights Reserved.
navigateToSubtitle: Quickly access our main features from one place.
bookNowCardDesc: Place an order for day-old chicks, growers, or mature birds and secure your spot in the queue.
agentPortalCardDesc: Access your referral dashboard, track commissions, and manage your earnings as a registered agent.
dashboardCardDesc: For managers and CEOs. Oversee bookings, manage products, and administer user accounts.
